## 基本のキ
:::

**このウェブサイトで使用しているYAML（初期設定）です**

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### YAML in building this website

``` yaml
project:
  type: website
  output-dir: _docs
  render:
    - "*.qmd"
    - "!drafts/"

website:
  title: "quarto-pe"
  navbar:
    aria-label: Main navigation
    background: dark
    search: true
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - text: Contents
        menu:
          - href: content1.html
            text: Content1
          - href: content2.html
            text: Content2
          - href: content3.html
            text: Content3

format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    css: styles.css
    toc: true
    code-fold: true
    code-tools: true
  pdf:
    documentclass: article
    margin-left: 30mm
    margin-right: 30mm

execute:
  echo: true
  warning: false
  error: false
  cache: true

freeze: auto

resources:
  - CNAME
  - .nojekyll

editor: visual
```
